Title: Author Correction: Zoonotic and vector-borne parasites and epilepsy in low-income and middle-income countries (Nature Reviews Neurology, (2020), 10.1038/s41582-020-0361-3)
Abstract: © 2020, Springer Nature Limited.In the article originally published online, an arrow was missing from Figure 3. This error has been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
